description.para: Objects and structures for the sound
Data for fadein/fadeout for the sound

briefdescription.para: ctor
dtor
init
Override when getting debug information.

description.para: Information about what type of effect the Effect is, without the need for casting

briefdescription.para: Get what type of effect the Effect is.

simplesect.para: EffectType What type of effect the Effect is

briefdescription.para: Check whether the Effect is EffectSound without casting.

simplesect.para: bool Whether the Effect is EffectSound

description.para: Methods to Play/Stop sound Generally, SEffectManager.PlaySound methods are used instead of SoundPlay

briefdescription.para: Plays sound.

parameterdescription.para: SoundParams Sound Parameters for the sound

simplesect.para: bool Whether the sound will start playing

briefdescription.para: Plays sound.

simplesect.para: bool Whether the sound will start playing

briefdescription.para: Plays sound.
Stops sound.

simplesect.para: Will not be immediately if a SoundFadeOutDuration was set

briefdescription.para: Stops sound.
Resets EffectSound.
Get whether EffectSound is currently playing.

simplesect.para: bool Whether EffectSound is currently playing

briefdescription.para: Returns true when the effect is playing, false otherwise.

description.para: Methods regarding the loading of the sound, used in SoundPlay

briefdescription.para: Loads in the sound when it is requested for playing through 'SoundPlayEx'.

parameterdescription.para: SoundParams Possibility of passing in an already existing SoundParams, else one will get created

briefdescription.para: Loads in the sound when it is requested for playing.

simplesect.para: Legacy, backwards compatibility

briefdescription.para: Helper for checking if params are valid.
Gets called to fill in the necessary data when the header has finished loading.

simplesect.para: Called from 'SoundPlayEx'

briefdescription.para: Validation of fade settings.

simplesect.para: Called from 'ValidateSoundWave'

briefdescription.para: Enables the frame event on the EffectSound.

simplesect.para: Called from 'ValidateSoundWave' when all is successful
So this is effectively enabling frame event on all valid EffectSound

description.para: Various events that can be overriden for custom behaviour

briefdescription.para: Event called on frame when enabled by SetEnableEventFrame(true)

simplesect.para: Is always enabled on sound
Called from SEffectManager.Event_OnFrameUpdate in MissionGameplay.OnUpdate

parameterdescription.para: float Time passed since the previous frame

briefdescription.para: Event called from SEffectManager when the Effect is registered.

simplesect.para: Should only ever be called by SEffectManager!

parameterdescription.para: int ID registered in SEffectManager

briefdescription.para: Event called from SEffectManager when the Effect is unregistered.

simplesect.para: Should only ever be called by SEffectManager!

briefdescription.para: Event called when sound starts playing.

simplesect.para: Inserted into events of m_SoundWaveObject

briefdescription.para: Event called when sound stops playing.

simplesect.para: Inserted into events of m_SoundWaveObject

briefdescription.para: Event called when sound fade in stops.

simplesect.para: Called from Event_OnFrameUpdate

briefdescription.para: Event called when sound fade out starts.

simplesect.para: Called from Event_OnFrameUpdate

description.para: Methods regarding automatic cleanup on stop

briefdescription.para: Sets whether Effect automatically cleans up when it stops.

simplesect.para: This means that it will be unregistered from SEffectManager as well

parameterdescription.para: bool Whether Effect automatically cleans up when it stops

briefdescription.para: Get whether Effect automatically cleans up when it stops.

simplesect.para: bool Whether Effect automatically cleans up when it stops

briefdescription.para: Sets whether EffectSound automatically cleans up when sound stops.

parameterdescription.para: bool Whether EffectSound automatically cleans up when sound stops

briefdescription.para: Get whether EffectSound automatically cleans up when sound stops.

simplesect.para: bool Whether EffectSound automatically cleans up when sound stops

description.para: Setters and getters for generic data and properties

briefdescription.para: Set parent for the sound to follow.

simplesect.para: The position of the sound is adjusted to the parent in Event_OnFrameUpdate...
There is no real parenting with sound, so the setters and getters for parents do the exact same

parameterdescription.para: Object The parent for the sound to follow

briefdescription.para: Get parent for the EffectSound.

simplesect.para: Object The parent for the EffectSound

briefdescription.para: Set parent for the sound to follow.

simplesect.para: The position of the sound is adjusted to the parent in Event_OnFrameUpdate...
There is no real parenting with sound, so the setters and getters for parents do the exact same

parameterdescription.para: Object The parent for the sound to follow
bool Whether to update the cached variable

briefdescription.para: Get parent for the EffectSound.

simplesect.para: There is no real parenting with sound, so the setters and getters for parents do the exact same
Object The parent for the EffectSound

briefdescription.para: Set the world position of the managed sound.

parameterdescription.para: vector The world position of the managed sound
bool Whether to update the cached variable

briefdescription.para: Get the current world position of the managed sound.

simplesect.para: vector The current world position of the managed sound

briefdescription.para: Set the current local position of the managed sound.

parameterdescription.para: vector The current local position for the managed sound
bool Whether to update the cached variable

briefdescription.para: Get the current local position of the managed sound.

simplesect.para: vector The current local position of the managed sound

briefdescription.para: Set WaveKind for the sound.

simplesect.para: Needs to be set before playing

parameterdescription.para: WaveKind The WaveKind for the sound

briefdescription.para: Set soundset for the sound.

simplesect.para: Needs to be set before playing

parameterdescription.para: string Name of the soundset to play

briefdescription.para: Get soundset for the sound.

simplesect.para: string Name of the soundset

briefdescription.para: Set if the sound loops.

parameterdescription.para: bool Whether the sound should loop

briefdescription.para: Sets whether UpdateEnvSoundControllers needs to be called during Loading.

parameterdescription.para: bool Whether UpdateEnvSoundControllers is called

briefdescription.para: Get the sound wave length.

simplesect.para: Legacy, exists for backwards compatibility
float The sound wave length

briefdescription.para: Get the sound wave length.

simplesect.para: float The sound wave length

briefdescription.para: Set the RELATIVE volume for the sound.

parameterdescription.para: float The relative volume for the sound

briefdescription.para: Get the RELATIVE volume set by 'SetSoundVolume'.

simplesect.para: float The relative volume for the sound set by 'SetSoundVolume'

briefdescription.para: Set the sound max volume.

simplesect.para: Seems to purely be used for fade in effect, rather than really setting the max volume...
Adjusts the current volume to this value as well

parameterdescription.para: float The maximum volume for the sound

briefdescription.para: Get the time since EffectSound started playing.

simplesect.para: May not reflect the actual time of the sound, as it can start at negative time to simulate speed of sound
float The time since EffectSound started playing

briefdescription.para: Set the sound fade in duration.

parameterdescription.para: float The fade in duration

briefdescription.para: Set the sound fade out duration.

parameterdescription.para: float The fade out duration

briefdescription.para: Helper for throwing sound errors.
Wrapper class for managing sound through SEffectManager.
